Achievement - Class in com.soctec.soctec.achievements
Achievements can be configured many different ways and contains Demands which must be completed to complete the Achievement.

achievement - Variable in class com.soctec.soctec.core.AchievementShowerActivity
 
AchievementCreator - Class in com.soctec.soctec.achievements
An AchievementCreator creates Achievement objects on request, either from a resource, or via public methods.
AchievementCreator() - Constructor for class com.soctec.soctec.achievements.AchievementCreator

AchievementsAdapter - Class in com.soctec.soctec.core
Adapter for displaying several properties from Achievement in a single ListView slot
AchievementsAdapter(Activity, LinkedList<String>, boolean) - Constructor for class com.soctec.soctec.core.AchievementsAdapter
Constructor that sets up the items in the list view and what they contain.
AchievementsFragment - Class in com.soctec.soctec.core
Used to order and display any number of Achievements in two ListViews, one for locked Achievements, and one for completed Achievements.
AchievementShowerActivity - Class in com.soctec.soctec.core
